projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here are some of my personal projects available on GitHub. By clicking on the image, you will be redirected to the project website, and by clicking on the title, you will go to the repository.

about-me.title: About me
about-me.description: Since I was a child, I used to take everything apart, trying to understand how the world works from the inside. That's where my passion for understanding how the logical circuits of my toys functioned came from, which led me to graduate in Computer Engineering at the Federal University of the SÃ£o Francisco Valley. At university, I faced various challenges in the fields of hardware and software, some of which you can check out on my GitHub. Currently, I am dedicated to full stack development, working with PHP, Laravel, React, Next.js and other modern technologies. I have experience in complete web development, from backend with Laravel and Django to frontend with React and TypeScript. I have also ventured into mobile projects (Flutter), data analysis, and artificial intelligence. Currently, I work as a full stack developer at UNIVASF and continue to improve my knowledge in software development.
